home.Hlohcwhp: Higher levels of Hero comes with higher profits
home.part1: Home page finish, various functional modules/codes and recruit hero system
home.part2: Open daily mining, part-time job/hero’s job transfer and income system
home.part3: Hero upgrade / transfer / rename, Challenger competition and Leaderboard functions
home.part4: Dungeon adventure mode, Inventory and Treasure box
home.part52: Equipment, talents, skills, PVP and more adventure maps and gameplay mode, etc.
home.warriorDesc: Honour is the driving force that the Knight will never get exhaust. The weapons that can be equipped include all one-handed or two-handed weapons except the wands. It can be equipped with shields and armors, knight has the strongest institution, balanced strength, and defense. They can protect their teammates by taunting/guarding skills.
home.mageDesc: The wizard has completely mastered the elemental power of the sanctuary world, and while causing high elemental damage. Wizards can also give the enemy a negative state. They can be equipped with wands and robes, but cannot use shield or armor. Wizard has the highest intelligence and spiritual growth, and causes dramatic damage.
home.hunterDesc: Hunters are ruthless avengers, they will stay away from danger and rely on crossbows and traps to destroy their enemy. Hunters can be equipped with bow and crossbow weapons, but not shields, and can be equipped with light or medium armor. Hunter has the best strength and they can be very agile. Hunters are the most consistent damage output for dungeon adventures
home.assassinDesc: The identity of the assassins is a mystery, they are good at dual-wielding weapons to cause a fatal blow to the enemy. The types of weapons that can be equipped include all one-handed weapons, which can be equipped with light shields, light and medium armor. They have the highest agility, strong willpower, and magic resistance. In e team fights usually have unexpected bursts of damage.

adventure.adv1desc: A forest shrouded in mist, suitable for the heroes who have just embarked on an adventure.
adventure.adv2desc: The wailing deep in the mine could not stop the warriors to explore the treasure.@ Intermediate Map
adventure.adv3desc: Only powerful warriors can conquer @ this land. @ Advanced Map

map.adv1desc: The ancient dark labyrinth is filled with the smell of death and decay. Come to meet your old enemies, 「die by destiny」 or 「live with glor」
map.adv2desc: All warriors are promoted to the same level. Only those with better equipment and talent can win
map.adv3desc: 只有最强大的勇士才能征服这片土地，@高级冒险地图

magic.successText: Congratulations! You got a new hero!
magic.tips1: 2 level 1 heroes with any attribute + 1200 Gold or 200 DLT can be fused into a brand new level 1 hero with random role and attribute, with 100% success rate.
magic.novicetips1: Two LV.1 cards with any attributes plus 50 Gold coins can be fused into a brand new LV.1 card, with a random occupation and attributes. The success rate is 100%.
magic.tips2: 4 heroes of the same level with any attribute + 6000 Gold or 1000 DLT can be fused into a new level +1 hero with random role and attribute, the fatigue value of the new card will be 1200 points. Success rate depends on the total fatigue value of the heroes.
magic.novicetips2: Four LV.1 cards with any attribute + 600 Gold coins can be fused into a brand new LV.2 card with a random occupation and attributes. The fatigue value of new card is 1200 points and the success rate is 90%. If the fusion fails, the card and Gold coins will be burned.
magic.magicInfo: Note: The higher total cards fatigue value has a higher success rate, from a minimum of 1% to a maximum of 90%.

alchemy.info1: Players can select any hero, the main attribute will be locked automatically. Alchemy costs 3000 Gold or 500 DLT each time and other 5 attributes will be changed randomly.
alchemy.info2: Note: There is no limit of Alchemy sessions, and heroes will retain their current fatigue value.

heros.transferEquipMessage: To transfer, you need to remove the hero's equipment
heros.updateTips: Note: There is a risk of failure when upgrading the heroes, or you can purchase insurance to upgrade.Please check Game Wiki for more details.
heros.failTips: After the hero is downgraded, the fatigue value will be reset!
heros.updateSuccessText: Congratulations warrior! You are getting stronger!

forge.logInfo1: After you pay successfully in your wallet, the following records will be generated if you fail to forge due to server abnormality
forge.logInfo2: After you reach the corresponding forging level, you can continue your last forging without any charge
forge.mes1: Basic Forge:50% success rate and add small amount of value for a successful forge. When any item is successfully forged, there is a 50% chance that the 「Premium Forge」will be activated.
forge.mes2: Premium Forge:70% success rate, with additional values added when the forge is successful. When any item is successfully forged, there is a 20% chance of activating the「Master Forge」.
forge.mes3: Master Forge:100% success rate. When the forge is successful it will add a maximum value compares to other options. Also, equipment will have a 3% chance to double the fortification.
forge.mes4: (A successful forge will escalate equipment by 1 level, only a 「Master Forge」will have a small chance of escalate by 2 level.)

message.serverErrorModel: Failed to obtain information due to network node delay. You can try again to solve the problem~
